business.headline: Sensex up 1,200 points day after Trump tariffs trigger mega market crashThe S&P BSE Sensex surged 1,217.78 points to 74,355.68, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 380.50 points to 22,542.10 as of 9:35 am.
Global markets show signs of recovery. Will Sensex and Nifty gain today?A slight improvement in global markets, especially in the US and Asia, has brought some hope after the recent sell-off.

Stocks to watch on April 8: M&M, BEL, Adani Ports, Tata Motors, TitanInvestors are likely to keep a close eye on Tuesday's market, looking for signs of a rebound. Asian markets opened higher, offering some relief after a choppy session in the US.

Wall Street's fear gauge spikes, stocks sink as Trump stands firm on tariffsWall Street equities have been hammered since US President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, announced on April 2, on all imports into the US and much higher levies on some major trading partners.

How market reacted briefly to Donald Trump tariff pause rumourA misinterpreted comment about Trump pausing tariffs briefly sent markets soaring before crashing. Social media spread the false claim, prompting a quick White House denial that ended the short-lived rally.

Wall Street slides again on tariff fears; will Sensex, Nifty follow suit?Wall Street remained weak on Monday, with all three major indexes falling for a third straight session. The drop came after US President Donald Trump announced a new round of heavy tariffs on imports, which led to retaliation from major trade partners, including China.

S&P 500 rebounds after early trade fall in volatile US market sessionThe S&P 500 has dropped 20% from its peak closing level reached in February. If it finishes at this level or lower, it would officially mark the start of a bear market from February onward.

LPG cylinder prices hiked by Rs 50 for both subsidised, non-subsidised consumersThe government has hiked LPG prices to recover past losses, pushing up household cooking costs at a time of rising economic uncertainty and global trade tensions.

After Trump, EU wants India to remove tariffs on car imports: ReportThe European Union is pressing India to eliminate steep import tariffs on automobiles under a long-delayed trade deal , with India signalling a willingness to offer more attractive terms.

Sensex closes 2,200 points lower as Dalal Street logs worst session in 10 monthsStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 2226.79 points lower at 73,137.90, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 742.85 points to trade at settle at 22,161.60. Most of the broader market indices also crashed during the extremely volatile trading session.

Excise duty on petrol, diesel increased by Rs 2; no impact on consumersThe move comes at a time when global crude oil prices are actually on a downward trend, driven by fears of a global trade war sparked by the US administration's reciprocal tariffs.

Apple flies iphones from India and China to dodge Trump's tariffs: ReportApple is closely studying how different tariff rules in various countries could impact its supply chain. The US remains one of Apple's key markets, and the company is trying to avoid passing on higher costs to customers.

entertainment.headline: Iron Man star Terrence Howard claims Diddy 'tried to have sex' with himIn a surprising revelation, American actor Terrence Howard accused music mogul Sean 'Diddy' Combs of making unwanted sexual advances. The allegations have sparked widespread media attention and debate.

Sikandar box office Day 9: Salman Khan's film crashes on 2nd MondaySalman Khan's 'Sikandar' registered an abysmal second Monday at the box office. The film didn't do anything extraordinary during the weekend either, and Monday further took its trajectory downward at the ticket window.

TV actor Karan Patel on OTT becoming 'soft porn', getting no work for 6 years'Yeh Hai Mohabbatein' and 'Kasturi' star Karan Patel spoke to Bharti Singh on her podcast and revealed that he has not been offered any TV show for the last six years. He also commented on the OTT scene, and why he thinks it has become a 'sleaze'.

Empuraan beats Manjummel Boys to become highest-grossing Malayalam filmDirector Prithviraj Sukumaran's 'L2: Empuraan', starring Mohanlal is the highest-grossing Malayalam film. The film surpassed 'Manjummel Boys' by earning over Rs 250 crore worldwide.

Allu Arjun rings in 43rd birthday with wife Sneha, children. See picIt's Tollywood superstar Allu Arjun's day! The Pushpa star celebrated his 43rd birthday with his wife, Allu Sneha Reddy, and children. Sneha shared a picture from their intimate and cosy bash.

Pics: Suhana Khan, Agastya Nanda step out for dinner with friends in MumbaiSuhana Khan and Agastya Nanda, who are rumoured to be dating, were seen dining at a Mumbai restaurant on Monday. They were seen with their friends.

Court: Actor Nani-backed courtroom drama to premiere on Netflix this AprilThe courtroom drama Court-State vs a Nobody is set to stream on Netflix from April 11. The film directed by Ram Jagadeesh, is backed by actor Nani.

How much does Nick Jonas earn? A peek into his lavish lifestyleNick Jonas, with a joint net worth of $80 million alongside wife Priyanka Chopra, built his fortune through music, acting, business ventures like Villa One tequila, real estate, and brand endorsements.

Ed Sheeran teams up with Arijit Singh for new album? Here's what we knowSingers Ed Sheeran and Arijit Singh's upcoming album collaboration has fans buzzing with excitement. The British singer confirmed the same during a recent podcast interview.

Bollywood has to own its mess and clean it: Nushratt BharucchaActor Nushrratt Bharuccha, in an exclusive interaction with India Today Digital, opened up about the post-pandemic struggles of Hindi cinema.

Jr NTR shares warm moment with Sukumar, fans hope for reunion. See pic A heartwarming photo of Jr NTR and Sukumar, shared by the director's wife Tabitha, has sent fans into a frenzy, sparking renewed speculation of a potential collaboration.

Did John Abraham bring his own pasta? Arjun Kapoor's comment leaves fans in splitsJohn Abraham's recent picture with his wife, Priya Runchal, and friends at a restaurant has emerged online. Arjun Kapoor's reaction to the photo has left fans in splits.

Mission Impossible Final Reckoning trailer: Tom Cruise is ready to risk it allMission Impossible 8 trailer: Tom Cruise's Ethan Hunt takes on AI in the final film of the franchise. Helmed by Christopher McQuarrie, it is set to release in May 2025.

Good Bad Ugly box office prediction and what Ajith Kumar's last five films earnedAjith Kumar's 'Good Bad Ugly' is all set to hit theatres on April 10. India Today spoke to trade expert in Chennai to gauge the pre-release buzz of the film.

Deepika Padukone to play Suhana Khan's mother in SRK's King: ReportDeepika Padukone is reportedly believed to reunite with Shah Rukh Khan for Siddharth Anand's King. As per reports, she is set to play Suhana Khan's mother in the upcoming movie.

The White Lotus Season 3 finale episode asks 'Is Karma even real?'The ideas of Karma, destiny and free will are explored in detail in The White Lotus, especially in the finale episode of the series. The show is currently available to stream on JioHotstar.

Mother-to-be Kiara Advani to make Met Gala debut this yearAfter Alia Bhatt, Kiara Advani is all set to make her much-anticipated Met Gala debut this year. Last year, she represented India at the Cannes Film Festival.

Tamannaah Bhatia shooting dance number for Raid 2, but not with Honey SinghActor Tamannaah Bhatia has been shooting for a special dance number in 'Raid 2'. However, as opposed to the viral reports, she has not collaborated with Honey Singh for the same.

Sonu Sood's video message for drivers after wife Sonali's road accidentDays after Sonu Sood's wife, Sonali, was injured in a road accident, the actor shared an important message for all drivers. The video message highlights the importance of seat belts for passengers sitting at the back of the car.

general news.headline: China hits back at Trump's 50% tariff threat: Mistake upon a mistakeTrump threatened China with an additional 50 per cent tariff amid escalating trade tensions, prompting strong retaliatory measures from Beijing, including rare-earth export controls.
Sensex up 1,200 points day after Trump tariffs trigger mega market crashThe S&P BSE Sensex surged 1,217.78 points to 74,355.68, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 380.50 points to 22,542.10 as of 9:35 am.

Elon Musk privately asked Trump to back down on China tariffs: ReportElon Musk took his fight against tariffs straight to Trump, hoping to change his mind. While clashing publicly with advisers, Musk quietly made his case behind the scenes—so far, without success.

Will Pucovski retires at 27 after multiple concussions: Star's tragic storyOnce touted as the Australian batting prodigy, Will Pucovski has retired from all forms of cricket after a prolonged battle with concussion injuries. In an emotional interview, the 27-year-old has explained the daily struggles he faces due to concussion injuries.

Is your vitamin D low? Your gut might be paying the priceThat post-lunch bloat, those unpredictable bathroom visits, and even chronic conditions like IBS or IBD could be tied to that sunshine vitamin you've been neglecting.

Don't find fair pricing: Piyush Goyal takes aim at China on tradeUnion Minister Piyush Goyal blamed China's unfair trade practices for global economic instability, adding that Beijing's increasing dominance in global trade is adversely impacting economies like India.

JEE candidates miss exam due to Deputy Chief Minister's convoy, probe orderedOver 20 JEE aspirants in Visakhapatnam allegedly missed their exam due to traffic delays reportedly caused by Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan's convoy. However, the police denied the allegation, but Kalyan's office ordered an inquiry into the incident.

Why new Waqf law has 5-year Muslim clauseThe Waqf (Amendment) Act of 2025 makes it a prerequisite for a person to be a practising Muslim for at least five years to make a Waqf donation. This clause has come under severe attack. A BJP MP, who was part of the Waqf bill JPC, explains what necessitated a wait period and why it is five years.
From WagonR to Ertiga and Fronx, Maruti cars to get costlier by up to Rs 62,000This is the second price hike being taken by Maruti this year, following a 4% hike in January 2025.

Girl, 6, raped and murdered by uncle; he hid her body in neighbour's car trunkA six-year-old girl was raped and murdered allegedly by her 24-year-old uncle in Chhattisgarh's Durg. The accused, who was arrested after questioning, hid the body in the trunk of a neighbour's car, police said.

Watch: Dire wolves howl again after more than 10,000 yearsColossal Biosciences has created three wolf pups that look like dire wolves, extinct for over 10,000 years. Using ancient DNA and CRISPR tech, scientists revived their appearance—but not their instincts.

Make it thumb rule: Chandrababu Naidu asks people to cut down on salt, oil, sugarAndhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu urged dietary restraint and daily exercise to curb chronic diseases, while unveiling a tech-driven health initiative and plans for a global medi-city in Amaravati.

Empuraan beats Manjummel Boys to become highest-grossing Malayalam filmDirector Prithviraj Sukumaran's 'L2: Empuraan', starring Mohanlal is the highest-grossing Malayalam film. The film surpassed 'Manjummel Boys' by earning over Rs 250 crore worldwide.

Amid Trump's reciprocal tariffs, India-US push for early bilateral trade dealExternal Affairs Minister S Jaishankar and US Secretary of State Marco Rubio spoke of advancing the trade talks between the two nations after Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs shook global markets. India hopes a bilateral trade agreement will ease tensions as exports risk a $5.76 billion hit under the full 26% tariff.

Virat Kohli on smashing fastest IPL fifty since 2018: Had to innovate and evolveIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Virat Kohli emphasised the importance of adapting to the demands of modern-day T20 cricket after hitting his fastest IPL fifty while batting first. Kohli took on both spinners and pacers in a fiery knock at the Wankhede Stadium on Monday, April 07.

Video: Hyderabad man attacks wife with bricks 14 times after argument, arrestedA 32-year-old man repeatedly attacked his 22-year-old wife with cement bricks following an argument outside a hospital in Hyderabad. The man was arrested and the woman was undergoing treatment for serious injuries.
Rashmika Mandanna, Shraddha, Abhishek Bachchan and celebs at Maddock success bashMaddock Films hosted a star-studded success bash in Mumbai. Take a look at the pictures here.

Why Mamata-teachers' meeting was marred by distrustThe emotionally-charged audience in Kolkata, made up of thousands of terminated teachers and non-teaching staff, got rhetorical assurances instead of concrete solutions

Congress's key meet in Ahmedabad today, Priyanka Gandhi may get bigger roleThe Congress leadership is actively exploring a more defined, and potentially elevated, role for Priyanka Gandhi as the party prepares for crucial deliberations in Ahmedabad on Tuesday.

Gaza war may end relatively soon: Donald Trump after talks with NetanyahuPresident Trump expressed hope for a near end to the Gaza war during a White House meeting with Netanyahu, while also holding talks with French and Middle Eastern leaders on securing a ceasefire.

Ed Sheeran teams up with Arijit Singh for new album? Here's what we knowSingers Ed Sheeran and Arijit Singh's upcoming album collaboration has fans buzzing with excitement. The British singer confirmed the same during a recent podcast interview.

US top court rejects Tahawwur Rana's plea against extradition to IndiaThe US Supreme Court's decision marks a crucial step in India's efforts to bring Tahawwur Rana to justice for his alleged involvement in the deadly Mumbai terror attacks that claimed over 160 lives.

Blast outside BJP leader Manoranjan Kalia's house in Punjab, grenade suspectedIn the CCTV footage accessed by the police, an individual is seen arriving hurling an unidentified object from a e-rickshaw and subsequently fleeing from the scene in the same vehicle.

Severe heatwave scorches North India, alert issued in Delhi for 2 daysNorth India reeled under its first major heatwave of the season, with temperatures soaring 5 degrees Celsius to 8 degrees Celsius above normal in several states, including Delhi, Rajasthan and Gujarat.

sports.headline: Powerplay with both bat and ball a big concern for MI: Coach JayawardeneMumbai Indians head coca Mahela Jayawardene has said that his team is lacking in the powerplay with both bat and ball. After their loss against RCB, MI are at the 8th position in the IPL points table.

KKR vs LSG Live Score: Kolkata host Lucknow in a mid-table clashKolkata Knight Riders (KKR) vs Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) Live Score IPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders will host Lucknow Super Giants in a mid-table group clash in the Indian Premier League on Tuesday at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata.

Bhuvneshwar Kumar goes past Bravo, becomes most successful pacer in IPL historyRCB fast bowler Bhuvneshwar Kumar scripted history with the wicket of Tilak Varma on Monday. With the wicket, Bhuvneshwar overtook Dwayne Bravo as the fast bowler with most wickets in the history of the IPL.

Devdutt Padikkal credits captain Rajat Patidar for RCB's brilliant startRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Devdutt Padikkal has credited captain Rajat Patidar for his side's impressive start in the ongoing IPL 2025 after the 12-run win over MI.

Watch: Apuia's last-gasp worldie take Mohun Bagan to ISL FinalLalengmawia 'Apuia' Ralte scored a world-class last-gasp goal helped Mohun Bagan qualify for the final of the Indian Super League on Monday, April 7. Apuia's goal left the Kolkata crowd stunned.

Rajat Patidar's RCB not a one-man show anymoreIPL 2025: With Rajat Patidar leading from the front, Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) have played as a unit, making a brilliant start to their campaign. On Monday, RCB stormed to their third win out of four matches in the ongoing tournament after beating Mumbai Indians by 12 runs.

In an emotional interview, the 27-year-old has explained the daily struggles he faces due to concussion injuries.

KKR vs LSG: Smart Kolkata face confident Lucknow in City of JoyIPL 2025, KKR vs LSG Match Preview: Kolkata Knight Riders and Lucknow Super Giants will be looking to continue their winning momentum when they face each other in Kolkata on Tuesday, April 8.

Saliva usage helps to shut out death overs with reverse swing: Lockie FergusonPunjab Kings fast bowler Lockie Ferguson shared his thoughts about the lifting of the saliva ban in the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) and said that it has massively helped bowlers to find some reverse swing in the death overs.

MI head coach not worried about Rohit Sharma's weakness against left-arm seamersMumbai Indians head coach Mahela Jayawardene said that he isn't too concerned about Rohit Sharma's weakness against left-arm seamers and said that he will find a way to counter it.

Hardik Pandya slams Tilak Varma's critics: People made lot out of last gameHardik Pandya slammed Tilak Varma's critics after his magnificent half-century against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in Match 20 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). Varma scored 56 off 29 balls, smashing four fours and as many sixes.

One Pandya had to win: Krunal feels for brother Hardik after last-over heroicsIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Krunal Pandya delivered with the ball in the final over, denying Mumbai Indians a record run chase. He and brother Hardik shared a warm embrace after the Monday night thriller on April 7.

RCB breach MI Wankhede fortress after 10 years in last-over thrillerIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Royal Challengers Bengaluru pulled off a stunning 10-run victory on Monday against the Mumbai Indians (MI) and beat the five-time champions at the Wankhede Stadium for the first time in 10 years.

Pakistan's Saim Ayub to return in PSL 2025 after completing injury rehabPakistan Super League 2025: Young opener Saim Ayub joined the Peshawar Zalmi squad after completely recovering from his injury. Saim was out of action since fracturing his ankle in a Test match in South Africa in January.

Virat Kohli on smashing fastest IPL fifty since 2018: Had to innovate and evolveIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Virat Kohli emphasised the importance of adapting to the demands of modern-day T20 cricket after hitting his fastest IPL fifty while batting first. Kohli took on both spinners and pacers in a fiery knock at the Wankhede Stadium on Monday, April 07.

Rohit Sharma ruining his own legacy: Fans slam MI batterIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Rohit Sharma scored 17 runs off nine balls against the Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) before left-arm pacer Yash Dayal accounted for his wicket.

Hardik Pandya first India cricketer to 5000 runs, 200 wickets in T20sIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Hardik Pandya had figures of 4-0-45-2 against the Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), also becoming the first Indian with the landmark of 5000 runs and 200 wickets in T20s.

Watch: Virat Kohli nudges Jasprit Bumrah in on-field banter after 27-ball fiftyIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Virat Kohli was focussed on hitting the big ones in the middle during his 67-run knock at the Wankhede Stadium. He was involved in a playful exchange with Jasprit Bumrah, who returned to competitive action after a long injury layoff.

Kohli took on both spinners and pacers in a fiery knock at the Wankhede Stadium on Monday, April 07.

He was involved in a playful exchange with Jasprit Bumrah, who returned to competitive action after a long injury layoff.

Injuries are a concern but we're capable of filling in big shoes: Shahbaz AhmedLucknow Super Giants (LSG) all-rounder Shahbaz Ahmed has said that injuries to fast bowlers were a concern ahead of the season, but their bench strength has successfully filled in the big shoes. LSG will take on Kolkata Knight Riders on Tuesday, April 8 at Eden Gardens in Kolkata.

Hope Rishabh Pant's poor form will continue against us: KKR's Ottis GibsonKolkata Knight Riders (KKR) assistant coach Ottis Gibson hopes that Rishabh Pant's poor form will continue against them in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). Pant has scored just 19 runs from four innings in the season so far.

No concerns about Sunil Narine's form, still early days: KKR assistant coachKolkata Knight Riders (KKR) assistant coach Ottis Gibson brushed aside any concerns on Sunil Narine's batting form ahead of their next fixture against Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) at Eden Gardens, Kolkata.

Virat Kohli becomes second-fastest batter to 13,000 T20 runsIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Virat Kohli became the fifth batter to reach 13000 T20 runs and the second-fastest to the milestone. The 36-year-old reached the milestone in the match against the Mumbai Indians (MI) at the Wankhede Stadium.

Jasprit Bumrah returns to competitive cricket for 1st time after 92 daysIPL 2025, MI vs RCB: Jasprit Bumrah has returned to competitive cricket in Mumbai Indians' clash against Rajat Patidar's Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) at the Wankhede Stadium.

Punjab Kings using Haaland's recovery tech to keep fresh in IPL 2025Punjab Kings players are using Erling Haaland's recovery tech to stay fresh in the IPL. Haaland invests in a company called Normatec, which is used by several plyers across several disciplines.

Siraj took 70-80 tickets for family, friends in Hyderabad, jokes Shubman GillIPL 2025, SRH vs GT: Fast bowler Mohammed Siraj delivered a standout performance in front of his family and friends, taking four wickets for Gujarat Titans against his former franchise, SunRisers Hyderabad.

South Africa announce new central contracts, 2 big stars opt to freelanceSouth Africa announced fresh contracts for its men's team on Monday, April 7. Two of South Africa's biggest batters, David Miller and Rassie van der Dussen, opted for freelance contracts.

Rohan Bopanna becomes oldest to win ATP Masters 1000 matchRohan Bopanna broke Canada's Daniel Nestor's record after becoming the oldest-ever player to win a match in an ATP Masters 1000 event. He won a match in the Monte Carlo Masters at the age of 45.

NBA: Stephen Curry shares adorable moment with son Caius in Warriors vs RocketsNBA star Stephen Curry had a heartwarming moment with his youngest son Caius during a timeout in a game between the Golden State Warriors and the Houston Rockets.

Harry Brook named England's new ODI and T20I captainYoung England batter Harry Brook has been named his team's new white-ball captain, replacing Jos Buttler, who recently stepped down from his role. He has led England in five ODIs so far and has won two matches.

Hope Digvesh Rathi does not repeat his celebration: Shahbaz AhmedKKR vs LSG: Young spinner Digvesh Rathi has been in the eye of the storm for his controversial celebration. Rathi's teammate has hoped that he will not repeat the celebration any more.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
